animeTitle: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Message in a Bottle
animeDescription: Picture drama episode included with Prince of Tennis official DVD fandisc.  Atobe, sneakily, throws a message in a bottle in the river, which winds up next to the Rikkai and the Seigaku regulars.  (Source: Prince of Tennnis Wiki)
animeCharacters: ['Echizen, Ryouma', 'Fuji, Shuusuke', 'Atobe, Keigo', 'Kikumaru, Eiji', 'Kirihara, Akaya', 'Sanada, Genichirou', 'Momoshiro, Takeshi', 'Oishi, Shuichiro', 'Yanagi, Renji', 'Oshitari, Yuushi']
animeVoices: ['Minagawa, Junko', 'Kaida, Yuki', 'Suwabe, Junichi', 'Takahashi, Hiroki', 'Morikubo, Shoutarou', 'Kusunoki, Taiten', 'Onosaka, Masaya', 'Kondou, Takayuki', 'Takemoto, Eiji', 'Kiuchi, Hidenobu']
